resources.string: Kolom ini tidak boleh kurang dari 8 karakter!
Prepare your used items that you want to post and take a photo of the item, then select the condition of the item and select analyze.
Our application will analyze the categories of goods that you have previously prepared.
Complete the Name, price, and Description of your item to provide information about the item, once everything is ready you can post the item and the item will go to your My Inventory.
Select or search for the item you want to exchange with your item, select Barter Trade to start the transaction.
Select an item in your My Inventory to trade with the item you want.
Both parties agree, you can complete the transaction by selecting the checklist.
Congratulations! The transaction is complete and you get the item you want.
Barter Trade, an eco-friendly way to renew a zero-waste lifestyle
